snippet.title: Feline Sweet Trailer - probably final version.
snippet.description:
So after taking some advice.
I tweaked and improved my trailer a good bit.

The advice was from 
https://www.youtube.com/c/JasonStorey
and he recommended 

Derek Lieu
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaCH6BbF7yG33hQHZFw065A

Awesome advice, some of which I actually did.
Some of which I didn't, but I know what they are, and I'm happy enough with the video now as it stands.

Link to game on the steams....
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1723390/Feline_Sweet/

Attribution stuffs and some other infos.

Artwise. (F)=free, but you should probs donate if you can.
1) Sinisterfonts.com. (F)
2) Google fonts then fontforge to edit it. (F)
3) OpenGameArt (F) - great for prototyping replaced in game.
2) Lovely 2d cat - note some mods to allow for walking and looking down.
3) 2d Penguin - full anims
4) Rexard icons - for bricks,door and swirl(edited in gimp to make swirly, and cracked), I have so much of his stuff, I'm not actually sure which bundles I used.
5) Backdrop - from humble bundle a while back, photographic stuff.
6) GUI pack animal world. (Ricimi)
7) GUI pack frozen. Another major cute pack from Ricimi.

Music. (There's more than this, but all are store bought)
Colossal game music.
Ultimate Game music collection.
Detectives song - www.renebreitbarth.com

SFX. 
9036 sound FX.
Pro sound collection.

Freesound stuff.(Basically as I had the links handy ^_^)
